result.arabic_text: فَإِمَّا تَثۡقَفَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَرۡبِ فَشَرِّدۡ بِهِم مَّنۡ خَلۡفَهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
result.translation: If you encounter them in battle, make a fearsome example of them[33] for those who are behind them, so that they may be deterred.
result.footnotes: [33] i.e., Treat the treacherous who betray their pledges with due severity.
